mapper.select: select ID, APP_NAME, APP_KEY, APP_SECRET, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME from oit_user_center.oit_app where ID = #{id}
select ID, APP_NAME, APP_KEY, APP_SECRET, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME from oit_user_center.oit_app limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into oit_user_center.oit_app(APP_NAME, APP_KEY, APP_SECRET, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{appName}, #{appKey}, #{appSecret}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.update:
update oit_user_center.oit_app
APP_NAME = #{appName},
APP_KEY = #{appKey},
APP_SECRET = #{appSecret},
STATUS = #{status},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID, APP_NAME, APP_KEY, APP_SECRET, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME from oit_user_center.oit_app where APP_KEY = #{appKey} AND STATUS = 1
